Serialized Form

  • Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier

    • Class edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.documentSignature extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • loadedStopWords

          boolean loadedStopWords

        • stopWords

          ArrayList<String> stopWords

        • vocab

          Vocabulary vocab
          Vocabulary holds a set of all know words These words are located in a data file that it can update or read

        • wordFrequency

          HashMap<String,​Integer> wordFrequency
          A hash map containing the words in the signature and their counts wordFrequency contains a map of: - (Key) The word itself - (Value) The frequency / weight of that word in the signature

    • Class edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.learningMachine extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • inputDocument

          textDocument inputDocument
          Associated document with this instance of the learning machine. Defaults to an empty location using the textDocument default constructor.

        • outputFileLocation

          String outputFileLocation
          File location for the saved training data. Defaults to "src/main/resources/training.dat"

        • savedTraining

          HashMap<Queue<Integer>,​SortedSet<Character>> savedTraining
          Contains pairings of document signatures and labels from the training data file. savedTraining contains a map of: - (Key) The signature contained in the file in the form of numbers separated by spaces. - (Value) The read label(s) at the end of the signature in the form of a sorted set of characters, each a label associated with the signature. A queue is ideal due to the FIFO setup being ideal for file reading, and it won't contain any data other than the signature numbers in the order they appear A sorted set of characters is used to automatically alphabetize and remove duplicates

        • vocab

          Vocabulary vocab
          Vocabulary contains a list of previously encountered words A default location is provided for the vocabulary data file

        • ASCIIExtensions

          Contains the input file location

    • Class edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.Vocabulary extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • dictionary

          SortedSet<String> dictionary
          Contains a set of words that may be added to the vocabulary

        • fileLocation

          String fileLocation
          Denotes the file location for the serialized vocabulary data. Defaults to resources in main. Can be altered.
